content.text: Hi! I'm a big fan of the movie Good Burger. What's your favorite movie?
Hi! My favorite movie is The Princess Bride. It's so funny and charming. What do you like about Good Burger?
I love the humor and the characters. It's a really fun movie to watch. I also like that it's about a fast food restaurant, which is something I can relate to.
I can see why you like it. It's a classic. What other movies do you like?
I also like The Breakfast Club, Ferris Bueller's Day Off, and Clueless. I'm a big fan of 80s movies.
Me too! Those are all great movies. I also like movies from the 90s, like The Matrix, Pulp Fiction, and Titanic.
I like all those movies too. I'm a big fan of classic movies. What kind of movies do you like to read?
I like to read all kinds of books, but I especially like historical fiction and science fiction. What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a lot of different things too, but I'm really into historical fiction right now. I'm also a big fan of mysteries and thrillers.
Me too! I love mysteries and thrillers. I think they're so suspenseful.
I know what you mean. I can't put them down.
